title: AvinankuDi mEviDum
sahitya:
AvinankuDi mEviDum vElanai anudinamum ini ninaindiDu manamE tiru


anupallavi

  bhAvam pOkka tanpAda prasAdam nADi sEvittiDak-kUDum yAvaraiyum Adarikkum


caraNam    cintai tanai nOgavE sheidiDum undan bandha vinai yAvumE parandODip-pOgumE
vandanai purindavan varam tannaip-peTru endat-tollaiyumE illAmal irundiDavE
